00098 #pragma pack( push, 1 )
00099 struct CreateCharacterMessage
00100 {
00101         DWORD   dwF656; 
00102 //      DWORD   dwBeefbeef;                             //0xBEEFBEEF always; probably used in place of GUID
00103         WORD    wLengthOfAccountName;   //Length of the account name
00104         char    szAccountName[40];              //40 byte account name; zero-filled
00105 //      DWORD   dwUnk1;                                 
00106         DWORD   dwValOne;                               //Constant 1
00107         DWORD   dwRace;                                 //Use CHARDATA_RACE_
00108         DWORD   dwSex;                                  //Use CHARDATA_SEX_
00109         DWORD   dwForeheadTexture;              //Value from a race-wide index of texures
00110         DWORD   dwNoseTexture;                  //Value from a race-wide index of texures
00111         DWORD   dwChinTexture;                  //Value from a race-wide index of texures
00112         DWORD   dwHairColor;                    //Value from a race-wide index of colors
00113         DWORD   dwEyeColor;                             //Value from a race-wide index of colors
00114         DWORD   dwHairStyle;                    //Use CHARDATA_HAIRSTYLE_
00115         DWORD   dwHatType;                              //Value from a race-wide index of hat types; 0xFFFFFFFF (-1) means no hat
00116         DWORD   dwHatColor;                             //Value from a race-wide index of colors
00117         DWORD   dwShirtType;                    //Value from a race-wide index of shirt types
00118         DWORD   dwShirtColor;                   //Value from a race-wide index of colors
00119         DWORD   dwPantsType;                    //Value from a race-wide index of pants
00120         DWORD   dwPantsColor;                   //Value from a race-wide index of colors
00121         DWORD   dwShoeType;                             //Value from a race-wide index of shoe types
00122         DWORD   dwShoeColor;                    //Value from a race-wide index of colors
00123         
00124         //Values range from 0x0000000000000000 to 3FF0000000000000000 (0-1)
00125         //Indicate degree of color shading
00126         double  dblSkinShade;                   
00127         double  dblHairShade;
00128         double  dblHatShade;
00129         double  dblShirtShade;
00130         double  dblPantsShade;
00131         double  dblShoeShade;
00132 
00133         DWORD   dwProfession;                   //CHARDATA_PROFESSION_
00134 
00135         DWORD   dwStrength;
00136         DWORD   dwEndurance;
00137         DWORD   dwCoordination;
00138         DWORD   dwQuickness;            
00139         DWORD   dwFocus;
00140         DWORD   dwSelf;
00141 
00142         DWORD   dwUnk2;
00143         DWORD   dwUnk3;
00144         
00145         DWORD   dwNumSkills;                    //Portal.dat file dependent
00146         DWORD   dwSkillStatus[0x30];    
00147         // 0 - Skill ID not used
00148         // 1 - Skill Unusable / Untrained
00149         // 2 - Skill Trained
00150         // 3 - Skill Specialized
00151         
00152         WORD    wNameLength;
00153         char    szName[40];
00154         DWORD   dwUnk4;                                 //Always 0xFFFFFFFF?
00155         DWORD   dwUnk5;                                 //Random value that has ranged from 0x02-0x0C
00156         DWORD   dwStartingPlace;                //CHARDATA_STARTINGTOWN_
00157         DWORD   dwUnk6;                                 //Random value that has ranged from 0x53-0x157
00158 };
